mapper.select: SELECT account, e.name as name, r.name as `rank`, d.name as dept, birth, gender, email, access, approved_at, FROM emp e JOIN dept d on d.id = e.dept_id JOIN `rank` r on r.id = e.rank_id WHERE access = 1
